channel.title: Comments on: RETRO: Klaus Nomi “Total Eclipse” live from ‘Urgh! A Music War’

item.title: By: k
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: Why don't we try and secure the rights to release it as a DVD?
item.content:encoded: Why don’t we try and secure the rights to release it as a DVD?

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description:
myspace.com/urghamusicwar
One of my favorite movies, Urgh! was so influential in shaping my music taste. Unfortunately, it will probably never see the light of day in DVD form. Rumor has it that three performances per artist were filmed. Somewhere, there is a treasure trove of music locked in a vault.
The Nomi Song was somewhat disappointing, or maybe my expectations were too high.
item.content:encoded:
myspace.com/urghamusicwar

One of my favorite movies, Urgh! was so influential in shaping my music taste.
Unfortunately, it will probably never see the light of day in DVD form. Rumor has it that three performances per artist were filmed. Somewhere, there is a treasure trove of music locked in a vault.

The Nomi Song was somewhat disappointing, or maybe my expectations were too high.
